parsing_result:
# Viewing Pictures

Pictures can be viewed in the viewfinder or LCD monitor.

To view pictures full frame, press the **PLAY** button.

!Play Button and Image

Press the focus stick (focus lever) left to page through pictures in reverse order. Press it right to page through pictures in the order recorded. Keep the stick pressed to scroll rapidly to the desired frame.

> ðŸ’¡ **Tips:**
> - To page through pictures, press and then rotate the front command dial. You can also use swipe gestures.
> - Pictures taken using other cameras are marked with a "gift image" icon to warn that they may not display correctly and that playback zoom may not be available.
